Guardrail: Prevent deleting specific CloudWatch Log groups and streams
Rationale: Security policies require that CloudWatch logs are retained for forensic investigations

Test Scenarios.Test-Scenario: Delete log stream in protected log group
Steps: Log in to the AWS console with a role that is not the INFRASTRUCTURE_AUTOMATION_ROLE in the statement but has access to CloudWatch Logs
Delete an old log stream in one of the protected log groups
